title: Bolts and Blip
resume: Bolts and Blip is a computer-animated television series that premiered in 2010 on the Canadian channel Teletoon. The show airs in the United States on 3net at 10:30am on Sundays and joined The CW's Saturday Morning block Vortexx on July 13, 2013 at 8:30am.
